original: Zetterlöf, Gbg, dispaschörsassist. i Gbg sed. 36. Led. av Sv:es adv:samf. sed. 38. *Zetterman, Karl Per Eric, skådespelare, Göteborg, (f. 3/9/86 i Sthlm av konsertsåing. Karl Fredrik Z. o. Char- lotta Forsman. G. 37 m. skådesp. Rosa Rydberg. — Korist v. Oscarsteat. 07, däreft. eng. h. Carl Barcklind, John Liander o. v. Folkteatrarna i Sthlm o. Gbg, anst. v. Stora teat. i Gbg fr. 23. Bl. roller: Don Juan, Almaviva ,i Figa-ros bröllop, Valentin i Faust, översteprästen i Aida, Ström i Muntra fruarna i Windsor, Tomas so i Låglandet, Frank i Läderlappen, Webster i Katja, P3aron Zeta i Den glada änkan, Basil i Greven av Luxemburg, Menelaus i Sköna Helena, Greve Lothar i En valsdröm.
translated:
Zetterlöf, Gbg, dispatch assistant in Gbg since 1936. Member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1938. 
*Zetterman, Karl Per Eric, actor, Gothenburg, (born on September 3, 1886 in Stockholm to concert singer Karl Fredrik Z. and Charlotta Forsman). Married in 1937 to actress Rosa Rydberg. Chorus member at the Oscar Theatre in 1907, then engaged at Carl Barcklind, John Liander and various Folk Theatres in Stockholm and Gothenburg. Employed at the Gothenburg Great Theatre from 1923. Notable roles include: Don Juan, Almaviva in The Marriage of Figaro, Valentin in Faust, the High Priest in Aida, Ström in The Merry Wives of Windsor, Tomas so in The Lowland, Frank in The Bat, Webster in Katja, Baron Zeta in The Merry Widow, Basil in The Count of Luxembourg, Menelaus in Beautiful Helena, Count Lothar in A Waltz Dream.
